forgotPassword.mensaje1: Enter your ID card, DNI or passport
forgotPassword.titulo1: Recover my password, or my data
forgotPassword.descripcion1: Select the information you will provide
forgotPassword.descripcion2.1: We have just sent your username, and a link to reset your password, to the email:
forgotPassword.descripcion2.3: If this is not your email, you must modify your email in the account you have with the company, and request the sending of this information again
forgotPassword.inputInvalido: There is no user that matches this
